name: Dash Dash Magic
description:
Made for Trijam #122
Theme was Transformation; Micro things. Theme got loose with the game with the time retriction.

Super simple game about dashing and dodging. 

WASD - To Move
Space - To Dash

Dash into enemies to kill them.
Avoid getting hit by magic projectiles.

Development time: 3h 5min
All code and assets were created in this time frame.
The music is premade (by me).
